mnd5:3.3: Te dvasatthiya ditthigatanam annatarannataram ditthigatam “idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaran”ti gahetva uggahetva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitva sakaya sakaya ditthiya vasanti pavasanti avasanti parivasanti.
mnd5:3.4: Yatha agarika va gharesu vasanti, sapattika va apattisu vasanti, sakilesa va kilesesu vasanti;
mnd5:3.6: Te dvasatthiya ditthigatanam annatarannataram ditthigatam “idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaran”ti gahetva uggahetva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitva sakaya sakaya ditthiya vasanti pavasanti avasanti parivasantiti—
mnd5:4.3: Uttarim kuruteti uttarim karoti, aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaram karoti
mnd5:4.4: “ayam sattha sabbannu”ti uttarim karoti, aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaram karoti.
mnd5:4.9: ayam maggo niyyaniko”ti uttarim karoti, aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaram karoti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti.
mnd5:5.1: Hinati anne tato sabbamahati attano sattharam dhammakkhanam ganam ditthim patipadam maggam thapetva sabbe parappavade khipati ukkhipati parikkhipati.
mnd5:5.8: natthettha suddhi va visuddhi va parisuddhi va mutti va vimutti va parimutti va ,
mnd5:5.9: natthettha sujjhanti va visujjhanti va parisujjhanti va muccanti va vimuccanti va parimuccanti va ,
mnd5:5.10: hina nihina omaka lamaka chatukka paritta”ti evamaha evam katheti evam bhanati evam dipayati evam voharatiti—
mnd5:6.3: Vivadaniti ditthikalahani ditthibhandanani ditthiviggahani ditthivivadani ditthimedhagani ca.
mnd5:10.1: Yadattani passati anisamsam, ditthe sute silavate mute vati.
mnd5:10.7: Yamditthiko sattha hoti, tamditthika savaka honti.
mnd5:10.8: Tamditthikam sattharam savaka sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti, labhati ca tatonidanam civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam.
mnd5:10.11: Ayam ditthi alam nagattaya va supannattaya va yakkhattaya va asurattaya va gandhabbattaya va maharajattaya va indattaya va brahmattaya va devattaya va;
mnd5:10.12: ayam ditthi alam suddhiya visuddhiya parisuddhiya muttiya vimuttiya parimuttiya;
mnd5:10.13: imaya ditthiya sujjhanti visujjhanti parisujjhanti muccanti vimuccanti parimuccanti;
mnd5:10.14: imaya ditthiya sujjhissami visujjhissami parisujjhissami muccissami vimuccissami parimuccissami ayatim phalapatikankhi hoti.
mnd5:10.16: Attano ditthiya ime dve anisamse passati, ditthasuddhiyapi dve anisamse passati, sutasuddhiyapi dve anisamse passati, silasuddhiyapi dve anisamse passati, vatasuddhiyapi dve anisamse passati, mutasuddhiyapi dve anisamse passati—
mnd5:10.19: Yamditthiko sattha hoti tamditthika savaka honti …pe…
mnd5:10.24: Mutasuddhiyapi ime dve anisamse passati dakkhati oloketi nijjhayati upaparikkhatiti—
mnd5:10.25: yadattani passati anisamsam ditthe sute silavate mute va.
mnd5:11.3: Tatthati sakaya ditthiya sakaya khantiya sakaya ruciya sakaya laddhiya.
mnd5:11.4: Samuggahayati idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaranti gahetva uggahetva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitvati—
mnd5:12.2: Annam sattharam dhammakkhanam ganam ditthim patipadam maggam hinato nihinato omakato lamakato chatukkato parittato dissati passati dakkhati oloketi nijjhayati upaparikkhatiti—
mnd5:15.3: Tasma hi dittham va sutam mutam va,
mnd5:16.2: Kusalati ye te khandhakusala dhatukusala ayatanakusala paticcasamuppadakusala satipatthanakusala sammappadhanakusala iddhipadakusala indriyakusala balakusala bojjhangakusala maggakusala phalakusala nibbanakusala, te kusala evam vadanti—
mnd5:16.3: “gantho eso, lagganam etam, bandhanam etam, palibodho eso”ti.
mnd5:16.4: Evam vadanti evam kathenti evam bhananti evam dipayanti evam voharantiti—
mnd5:17.2: Yam nissitoti yam sattharam dhammakkhanam ganam ditthim patipadam maggam nissito sannissito allino upagato ajjhosito adhimutto.
mnd5:17.3: Passati hinamannanti annam sattharam dhammakkhanam ganam ditthim patipadam maggam hinato nihinato omakato lamakato chatukkato parittato dissati passati dakkhati oloketi nijjhayati upanijjhayati upaparikkhatiti—
mnd5:18.1: Tasma hi dittham va sutam mutam va, silabbatam bhikkhu na nissayeyyati.
mnd5:18.2: Tasmati tasma tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana dittham va ditthasuddhim va sutam va sutasuddhim va mutam va mutasuddhim va silam va silasuddhim va vatam va vatasuddhim va na nissayeyya na ganheyya na paramaseyya nabhiniveseyyati—
mnd5:18.3: tasma hi dittham va sutam mutam va silabbatam bhikkhu na nissayeyya.
mnd5:20.3: Tasma hi dittham va sutam mutam va,
mnd5:22.1: Ditthimpi lokasmim na kappayeyya, nanena va silavatena vapiti.
mnd5:22.2: Atthasamapattinanena va pancabhinnananena va micchananena va, silena va vatena va silabbatena va, ditthim na kappayeyya na janeyya na sanjaneyya na nibbatteyya na abhinibbatteyya.
mnd5:22.4: ditthimpi lokasmim na kappayeyya nanena va silavatena vapi.
mnd5:23.2: Sadisohamasmiti attanam na upaneyya jatiya va gottena va kolaputtiyena va vannapokkharataya va dhanena va ajjhenena va kammayatanena va sippayatanena va vijjatthanena va sutena va patibhanena va annatarannatarena va vatthunati—
mnd5:24.2: Hinohamasmiti attanam na upaneyya jatiya va gottena va …pe… annatarannatarena va vatthuna.
mnd5:24.3: Seyyohamasmiti attanam na upaneyya jatiya va gottena va …pe… annatarannatarena va vatthunati—
mnd5:28.4: Attam pahayati tanhavasena ditthivasena gahitam paramattham abhinivittham ajjhositam adhimuttam pahaya pajahitva vinodetva byantim karitva anabhavam gametvati—
mnd5:28.6: Anupadiyanoti catuhi upadanehi anupadiyamano aganhamano aparamasamano anabhinivisamanoti—
mnd5:29.1: Nanenapi so nissayam no karotiti atthasamapattinanena va pancabhinnananena va micchananena va tanhanissayam va ditthinissayam va na karoti na janeti na sanjaneti na nibbatteti na abhinibbattetiti—
mnd5:30.1: Sa ve viyattesu na vaggasariti sa ve viyattesu bhinnesu dvejjhapannesu dvelhakajatesu nanaditthikesu nanakhantikesu nanarucikesu nanaladdhikesu nanaditthinissayam nissitesu chandagatim gacchantesu dosagatim gacchantesu mohagatim gacchantesu bhayagatim gacchantesu na chandagatim gacchati na dosagatim gacchati na mohagatim gacchati na bhayagatim gacchati na ragavasena gacchati na dosavasena gacchati na mohavasena gacchati na manavasena gacchati na ditthivasena gacchati na uddhaccavasena gacchati na vicikicchavasena gacchati na anusayavasena gacchati na vaggehi dhammehi yayati niyyati vuyhati samhariyatiti—
mnd5:31.2: Tassa dvasatthi ditthigatani pahinani samucchinnani vupasantani patipassaddhani abhabbuppattikani nanaggina daddhani.
mnd5:31.3: So kinci ditthigatam na pacceti na paccagacchatiti—
mnd5:35.1: Yassubhayante panidhidha natthi, bhavabhavaya idha va huram vati yassati arahato khinasavassa.
mnd5:35.2: Antoti phasso eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto;
mnd5:35.3: atito eko anto, anagato dutiyo anto;
mnd5:35.4: sukha vedana eko anto, dukkha vedana dutiyo anto;
mnd5:35.5: namam eko anto, rupam dutiyo anto;
mnd5:35.6: cha ajjhattikani ayatanani eko anto, cha bahirani ayatanani dutiyo anto;
mnd5:35.7: sakkayo eko anto, sakkayasamudayo dutiyo anto.
mnd5:35.9: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd5:36.1: Bhavabhavayati bhavabhavaya kammabhavaya punabbhavaya kamabhavaya, kammabhavaya kamabhavaya punabbhavaya rupabhavaya, kammabhavaya rupabhavaya punabbhavaya arupabhavaya, kammabhavaya arupabhavaya punabbhavaya punappunabbhavaya punappunagatiya punappunaupapattiya punappunapatisandhiya punappunaattabhavabhinibbattiya.
mnd5:36.14: Yassubhayante panidhidha natthi bhavabhavaya idha va huram vati.
mnd5:36.15: Yassa ubho ante ca bhavabhavaya ca idha huranca panidhi tanha natthi na santi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
mnd5:36.16: yassubhayante panidhidha natthi bhavabhavaya idha va huram va.
mnd5:37.7: Nivesana tassa na santi keciti nivesana tassa na santi keci natthi na santi na samvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
mnd5:38.3: Niccheyyati nicchinitva vinicchinitva vicinitva pavicinitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
mnd5:38.4: Samuggahitanti odhiggaho bilaggaho varaggaho kotthasaggaho uccayaggaho samuccayaggaho, “idam saccam taccham tatham bhutam yathavam aviparitan”ti gahitam paramattham abhinivittham ajjhositam adhimuttam natthi na santi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahinam samucchinnam vupasantam patipassaddham abhabbuppattikam nanaggina daddhanti—
mnd5:42.1: Tassidha ditthe va sute mute va, pakappita natthi anupi sannati.
mnd5:42.3: Tassa ditthe va ditthasuddhiya va sute va sutasuddhiya va mute va mutasuddhiya va sannapubbangamata sannavikappayeyyata sannaviggahena sannaya utthapita samutthapita kappita pakappita sankhata abhisankhata santhapita, ditthi natthi na santi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
mnd5:42.4: tassidha ditthe va sute mute va pakappita natthi anupi sanna.
mnd5:43.6: Tam brahmanam ditthimanadiyantam aganhantam aparamasantam anabhinivesantanti—
mnd5:44.7: Tanhakappassa pahinatta, ditthikappassa patinissatthatta kena ragena kappeyya kena dosena kappeyya kena mohena kappeyya kena manena kappeyya kaya ditthiya kappeyya kena uddhaccena kappeyya kaya vicikicchaya kappeyya kehi anusayehi kappeyya—
mnd5:44.8: rattoti va dutthoti va mulhoti va vinibaddhoti va paramatthoti va vikkhepagatoti va anitthangatoti va thamagatoti va.
mnd5:44.11: nerayikoti va tiracchanayonikoti va pettivisayikoti va manussoti va devoti va rupiti va arupiti va sanniti va asanniti va nevasanninasanniti va.
mnd5:44.12: So hetu natthi paccayo natthi karanam natthi, yena kappeyya vikappeyya vikappam apajjeyya.
mnd5:48.5: Yavata tanhasankhatena simakatam mariyadikatam odhikatam pariyantakatam pariggahitam mamayitam—
mnd5:48.6: idam mamam, etam mamam, ettakam mamam, ettavata mamam, mama rupa sadda gandha rasa photthabba, attharana pavurana dasidasa ajelaka kukkutasukara hatthigavassavalava khettam vatthu hirannam suvannam gamanigamarajadhaniyo ratthanca janapado ca koso ca kotthagaranca, kevalampi mahapathavim tanhavasena mamayati, yavata atthasatatanhavicaritam—
mnd5:48.9: Visativatthuka sakkayaditthi, dasavatthuka micchaditthi, dasavatthuka antaggahikaditthi, ya evarupa ditthi ditthigatam ditthigahanam ditthikantaram ditthivisukayikam ditthivipphanditam ditthisamyojanam gaho patiggaho abhiniveso paramaso kummaggo micchapatho micchattam titthayatanam vipariyesaggaho viparitaggaho vipallasaggaho micchagaho, ayathavakasmim yathavakanti gaho, yavata dvasatthi ditthigatani—
mnd5:48.12: Tanhakappassa pahinatta, ditthikappassa patinissatthatta tanhakappam va ditthikappam va na kappenti na janenti na sanjanenti na nibbattenti na abhinibbattentiti—
mnd5:49.7: Tanhapurekkharassa pahinatta, ditthipurekkharassa patinissatthatta na tanham va na ditthim va purato katva caranti na tanhadhaja na tanhaketu na tanhadhipateyya na ditthidhaja na ditthiketu na ditthadhipateyya.
mnd5:49.8: Na tanhaya va na ditthiya va parivaretva carantiti—
mnd5:50.4: Na paticchitaseti “sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti na paticchitase.
mnd5:50.12: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
mnd5:50.13: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti na paticchitaseti—
mnd5:51.7: Brahmano silena va vatena va silabbatena va na yayati na niyyati na vuyhati na samhariyatiti—
mnd5:52.3: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
mnd5:52.4: So parangato parappatto antagato antappatto kotigato kotippatto (vittharo) jatimaranasamsaro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
mnd5:52.6: Na paccetiti sotapattimaggena ye kilesa pahina, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccagacchati.
mnd5:52.7: Sakadagamimaggena ye kilesa pahina, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccagacchati.
mnd5:52.8: Anagamimaggena ye kilesa pahina, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccagacchati.
mnd5:52.9: Arahattamaggena ye kilesa pahina, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccagacchatiti—
mnd5:52.12: itthanitthe tadi, cattaviti tadi, tinnaviti tadi, muttaviti tadi, tamniddesa tadi.
mnd5:53.2: Araha labhepi tadi, alabhepi tadi, yasepi tadi, ayasepi tadi, pasamsayapi tadi, nindayapi tadi, sukhepi tadi, dukkhepi tadi.
mnd5:53.3: Ekance baham gandhena limpeyyum, ekance baham vasiya taccheyyum—
mnd5:53.4: amusmim natthi rago, amusmim natthi patigham, anunayapatighavippahino ugghatinighativitivatto anurodhavirodhasamatikkanto.
mnd5:54.2: Arahato rago catto vanto mutto pahino patinissattho.
mnd5:54.24: sabbakusalabhisankhara catta vanta mutta pahina patinissattha.
mnd5:55.2: Araha kamogham tinno bhavogham tinno ditthogham tinno avijjogham tinno sabbam samsarapatham tinno uttinno nittinno atikkanto samatikkanto vitivatto.
mnd5:55.3: So vutthavaso cinnacarano jatimaranasamsaro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti.
mnd5:56.2: Arahato raga cittam muttam vimuttam suvimuttam,
mnd5:57.2: Araha sile sati silavati tamniddesa tadi;
